signalslinkep:usageinfo-signalslinkep-te:
SignalsLink.EP
Extends the Signals mod with components that cooperate with the Electrical Progressive mod.

Electrical Progressive
EP switch
A switch controlled by a signal. Allows turning the flow of electrical current on or off.
If there is a signal on the input, the switch is on. If there is no signal on the input, the switch is off.
EP meter
Allows obtaining information about the state of the electrical network to which the meter is connected.
If the input signal is 1, the output signal shows the charge level of the batteries in the network.
If the input signal is 2, the output signal shows the production/consumption balance of electricity. Values 1-7: more is consumed than produced, 8: consumption=production, 9-15: production exceeds consumption.
If another signal is on the input, the output signal is 0.
